price: Moisés disse: "Ó Aarão! Quando os viste se descaminharem, o que te impediu".
arabic: قَالَ يَٰهَٰرُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓاْ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāhārūnu mā manaʿaka idh ra-aytahum ḍallū
